Doc: A type to define an early termination provision for which exercise is mandatory.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type to define an early termination provision for which exercise is mandatory.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.MandatoryEarlyTermination {
  # The early termination date associated with a mandatory early termination of a swap.
  mandatoryEarlyTerminationDate : FpML5.confirmation.AdjustableDate

  # The ISDA Calculation Agent responsible for performing duties associated with an optional early termination.
  calculationAgent : FpML5.confirmation.CalculationAgent

  # If specified, this means that cash settlement is applicable to the transaction and defines the parameters associated with the cash settlement prodcedure. If not specified, then physical settlement is applicable.
  cashSettlement : FpML5.confirmation.CashSettlement

  # The adjusted dates associated with a mandatory early termination provision. These dates have been adjusted for any applicable business day convention.
  mandatoryEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates : FpML5.confirmation.MandatoryEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates?

  id : string?

}

mandatoryEarlyTerminationDate.Doc: The early termination date associated with a mandatory early termination of a swap.
mandatoryEarlyTerminationDate.Name: mandatoryEarlyTerminationDate

calculationAgent.Doc: The ISDA Calculation Agent responsible for performing duties associated with an optional early termination.
calculationAgent.Name: calculationAgent

cashSettlement.Doc: If specified, this means that cash settlement is applicable to the transaction and defines the parameters associated with the cash settlement prodcedure. If not specified, then physical settlement is applicable.
cashSettlement.Name: cashSettlement

mandatoryEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates.Doc: The adjusted dates associated with a mandatory early termination provision. These dates have been adjusted for any applicable business day convention.
mandatoryEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates.Name: mandatoryEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates
